member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinder
member.summary: Searches for businesses and places.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinder.FindLocalLocationsAsync(System.String,Windows.Devices.Geolocation.Geocircle,System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets information about businesses and places that meet the specified search criteria.
member.param: The query text of the search; that which you're searching for.
The geographic area to be included in the search.

The search categories used to limit search results. We recommend using one or more LocalCategories properties to specify *localCategory*. Use a semicolon "**;** " separator to specify more than one category.
The maximum number of results to return from the search.
member.returns: The relevant businesses or places that meet the specified search criteria, of type LocalLocationFinderResult.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderResult
member.summary: Represents the results of a search performed by the FindLocalLocationsAsync method.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderResult.LocalLocations
member.summary: Gets the businesses and places that meet the specified search criteria, if any.
member.returns: The businesses and places that meet the specified search criteria, if any, of type LocalLocation.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderResult.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the search performed by the FindLocalLocationsAsync method.
member.returns: The status of the search performed by the FindLocalLocationsAsync method.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus
member.summary: Specifies the status of a search performed by the FindLocalLocationsAsync method.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.InvalidCategory
member.summary: One or more of the specified categories are not valid.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.InvalidCredentials
member.summary: The app does not have the credentials necessary to perform the search.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.InvalidSearchArea
member.summary: The specified geographic area is not valid.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.InvalidSearchTerm
member.summary: The specified search text is not valid.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.NetworkFailure
member.summary: The search encountered a network failure.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.NotSupported
member.summary: The search is not supported on this device.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.Success
member.summary: The search completed successfully.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.LocalSearch.LocalLocationFinderStatus.UnknownError
member.summary: The search encountered an unknown error.
